summary: A simple fix for an issue I ran into. Hail Sithis! bugged on me and I was forced to complete with console commands. This prevented the Nightmother from appearing in the sanctuary. This mod was the quickest and easiest way to fix it.
descriptionHtml: I am not a pro modder by any means, but I was able to fix an issue I had with the Nightmother spawn in DS Sanctuary. Recommended you DO NOT install until the bug happens, and remove if you start a new game. I won't really hurt anything, but the first time you step into DS Sanctuary the Nightmother will already be there. Simply removed the "initially disabled" option from her coffin to make her reappear. I did not find much on this glitch, but then again I do have a heavily modded game. Though I would throw this out there if anyone else had this issue.
author: ZoSoGetsu
